statements: DELETE FROM CustomerBehaviorForecasting WHERE customer_id = 100 AND prediction_score > 4.5
DELETE FROM customer_activity WHERE activity_type = 'Purchase' AND activity_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM purchase_history WHERE customer_id = 100 AND total_amount > 500.00;
DELETE FROM behavior_analysis WHERE prediction_accuracy < 0.75 AND customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_data WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe');
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 10 AND category = 'Electronics';
DELETE FROM purchases WHERE customer_id = 101 AND total_amount > 1000.00;
DELETE FROM products WHERE stock_quantity < 50 OR price > 500.00;
